title: The Reluctant Tommy: An Extraordinary Memoir of the First World War
description: This is the story of a young man who went to war a devoted servant of King and country and returned utterly convinced that war was wrong and who acted upon his convictions, making a pact with God that he would not kill. This memoir, written 50 years after the end of the war, draws on his diary entries and letters home.
author: Ronald Skirth
